医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
社区卫生工作者改善圣安东尼奥居家老年患者的健康状况在 COVID-19 大流行期间，保持健康和保持联系对每个人来说都很困难，对于居家的老年患者及其护理人员来说尤其如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Community-health-workers-improve-health-of-homebound-older-病人-in-San-Antonio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Community-health-workers-improve-health-of-homebound-older-病人-in-San-Antonio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c65e670-1a25-441b-afe7-fb29fe77dd88 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 16:12:26 -0400 Community health workers improve health of homebound older patients in San Antonio
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款 300 万美元，用于调查母亲体重指数 (BMI) 与儿童肥胖之间的关系密歇根州立大学和亨利·福特健康中心的研究人员从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家糖尿病、消化和肾脏疾病研究所获得了 300 万美元的资助，用于研究母亲体重指数 (BMI) 与儿童肥胖之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/243-million-NIH-grant-awarded-to-investigate-the-connections- Between-maternal-BMI-and-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/243-million-NIH-grant-awarded-to-investigate-the-connections- Between-maternal-BMI-and-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71142894-1bcf-4c00-95b4-0bb35c35845e Tue, 25 Jul 2023 15:37:21 -0400 $3 million NIH grant awarded to investigate the connections between maternal BMI and childhood obesity
维生素 D 水平可能在银屑病严重程度中发挥重要作用在美国，超过 800 万人患有牛皮癣，这是一种皮肤细胞堆积并形成发痒的干燥斑块的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Vitamin-D-levels-could-play-an-important-role-in-psoriasis-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Vitamin-D-levels-could-play-an-important-role-in-psoriasis-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb03da2-d3c5-4335-893f-0e91091f314e Tue, 25 Jul 2023 15:23:11 -0400 Vitamin D levels could play an important role in psoriasis severity
社会关怀和数据的未来NDG 反映了 NHS 与社会关怀之间的关系以及使用数据的重要性。她还概述了 Caldicott Guardians 对处理社会护理数据的组织的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-future-of-social-care-and-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-future-of-social-care-and-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75bef816-7b89-4aaa-806a-80cd8ea15634 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 12:06:12 -0400 The future of social care and data
UKHSA 推出新战略，准备和应对健康威胁新战略阐述了 UKHSA 未来 3 年的愿景和目标，以准备和应对健康威胁，并建立未来保护国家的能力和技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/UKHSA-unveils-new-strategy-to-prepare-for-and-respond-to-health-threats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/UKHSA-unveils-new-strategy-to-prepare-for-and-respond-to-health-threats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a9bfae6-801e-4d8a-b7e1-7ef6c2cb9cbd Tue, 25 Jul 2023 12:00:34 -0400 UKHSA unveils new strategy to prepare for and respond to health threats
针对慢性子宫内膜炎：研究揭示潜在的诊断标志物研究人员研究了慢性子宫内膜炎 (CE) 的基因表达特征和免疫细胞参与情况，以寻找潜在的诊断标记。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Targeting-chronic-endometritis-study-reveals-potial-diagnostic-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Targeting-chronic-endometritis-study-reveals-potial-diagnostic-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6ff9f1e-dc10-42ad-9a2b-8b1994d8f13c Tue, 25 Jul 2023 09:32:00 -0400 Targeting chronic endometritis: study reveals potential diagnostic markers

医院第 14 次要求国会推迟 ACA 医疗补助资金削减这在华盛顿已经成为像春天的樱花一样熟悉的景象：来自全国医院的游说者聚集在国会大厦，要求立法者推迟《平价医疗法案》规定的数十亿美元的医疗补助资金削减——这是行业领袖多年前同意的削减措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Hospitals-ask-Congress-to-delay-ACA-Medicaid-funding-cuts-e28094-for-the-14th-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Hospitals-ask-Congress-to-delay-ACA-Medicaid-funding-cuts-e28094-for-the-14th-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97961bd3-5563-4449-b5e9-d24f4fb16a23 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 06:50:02 -0400 Hospitals ask Congress to delay ACA Medicaid funding cuts — for the 14th time
糖尿病药物对患癌症风险的影响为了辨别某些糖尿病药物引起的癌症风险，最近一篇论文的作者对过去十年来涉及该主题的所有研究进行了系统回顾和荟萃分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-effect-of-diabetes-medications-on-the-risk-of-developmenting-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-effect-of-diabetes-medications-on-the-risk-of-developmenting-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9398f420-bd92-4bf3-890a-9cb641557dfd Tue, 25 Jul 2023 06:08:00 -0400 The effect of diabetes medications on the risk of developing cancer
